short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always have access to the things you're always copy and pasting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever gone through a job search where they want you to add a link to your portfolio, or GitHub, or whatever else they always want? 

It get bothersome finding where you kept the text, highlighting it, copying, etc. So instead, this aims to keep the things you copy and paste in a neat little window, always accessible when you need it.

Sorry about the wonky screen shots. The aspect ratio, height and width are mandated.
